actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of remuneration an election official or worker may receive and be excluded from an agreement between a State and the Secretary providing for the extension of benefits under such title to State employees.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of remuneration an election official or worker may receive and have excluded from an agreement between a State and the Secretary of Health and Human Services providing for the extension of benefits under such title to State employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of remuneration an election official or worker may receive and be excluded from an agreement between a State and the Secretary providing for the extension of benefits under such title to State employees.
